completion 100 achievements  playtime 336 hours  mini metro is a fun puzzleesque game i dipped into during spare moments its less about traditional problemsolving and more focused on timing planning and using the games mechanics to manage constantly shifting randomly generated traffic patterns  its a solid pick for short satisfying sessions and theres a quiet elegance to its design that makes for a relaxing but mentally engaging experience
